name: Color Space
description:
This is our GGJ 2017 entry.

Use A, S, D buttons to shoot colorful waves (Red, Green, Blue). When an enemy ship comes to you, you need to shoot a wave the same color as the enemy. You can merge colors by pressing the two buttons at the same time (press Green and Blue to create Cyan, for example).

Use mouse to aim.

#ggj #ggj2017 #ggjturkey #ggj17

Credits

Ahmet Kamil Keleş
